nodes.bodyText: Maybe we should use apiextensions().v1() CustomResourceDefinition instead?

What do you think about using the single argument customResource method? I think it's more readable and will avoid creation of FooBarList.
final MixedOperation<FooBar, KubernetesResourceList<FooBar>, Resource<FooBar>> fooBarClient = server.getClient().customResources(FooBar.class);

Once #2665 is merged we can revisit or improve this test (if necessary). Right now its main use is just making sure 1109 doesn't happen again, especially considering what went on in  #2658 discussion about removing certain components.
I've approved the PR already since these comments are really minor nitpicks.
